title: cintaiyil ninaittadum
sahitya:
cintaiyil ninattadum vandu mun nirppAn sendil vaDivElan shivattaNal murugan


anupallavi

  bandha vilangugaL sindi sidariDa paghaikkula rAkSasar tighaippuDan padariDa
tam dhimit tOm enat-tANDavam AdiDum tanga mayilin mElE shen kadir pOlE
				(toghaiyarA)
eppOdum uNmai anbar idayattil iruppAn eNNik-kai tozhuvAr Ekkam tavirppAn iLam tiru vIran iNaiyilAp-para sUran


caraNam    tanjam enraDaindavar cancalam tIrumE samaya sanjIviyAit-tuNai vandu sErumE
anjal anjal enrE abhayak-karam kATTi aruL sheyyum guruparan ArumukhanaiyE
